pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍanakato hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.3: So sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.4: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.5: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghabhattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.8: “eso, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto tumhākaṁ sambhāvito kulūpako; yeneva hatthena saddhādeyyaṁ bhuñjati teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.9: So sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.10: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.12: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.13: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.14: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.17: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:1.20.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa āroceyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.8: cattāri ca pārājikāni, terasa ca saṅghādisesā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.10: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.12: āroceyya itthiyā vā purisassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.16: Atthi bhikkhusammuti kulapariyantā, na āpattipariyantā, atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantā ca kulapariyantā ca, atthi bhikkhusammuti neva āpattipariyantā na kulapariyantā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.22: āpattiyo ca pariggahitāyo honti, kulāni ca pariggahitāni honti— “ettakāhi āpattīhi ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.24: āpattiyo ca apariggahitāyo honti, kulāni ca apariggahitāni honti— “ettakāhi āpattīhi ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.25.1: Āpattipariyante yā āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti, tā āpattiyo ṭhapetvā aññāhi āpattīhi āroceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.26: Kulapariyante yāni kulāni pariggahitāni honti, tāni kulāni ṭhapetvā aññesu kulesu āroceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.1.27: Āpattipariyante ca kulapariyante ca yā āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti, tā āpattiyo ṭhapetvā yāni kulāni pariggahitāni honti, tāni kulāni ṭhapetvā aññāhi āpattīhi aññesu kulesu āroceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.2.1: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā duṭṭhullāpattisaññī anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.2.2: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā vematiko anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.2.3: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā aduṭṭhullāpattisaññī anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc9:2.2.5: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṁ vā aduṭṭhullaṁ vā ajjhācāraṁ āroceti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
